title: Food Foraging and Preparation in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is one of the main objectives of the Food Foraging and Preparation unit?
choices: Identify edible and medicinal plants in Timor-Leste
questions.answer: Identify edible and medicinal plants in Timor-Leste

questions.question: Which of the following is a key topic covered in this unit?
What type of activity is included in this unit to practice foraging skills?
choices: Guided foraging walk with local experts
questions.answer: Guided foraging walk with local experts

questions.question: What ethical consideration is emphasized in the foraging unit?
Which environments are specifically mentioned for foraging in Timor-Leste?
What is the recommended number of edible plants students should be able to identify by the end of the lesson?
What type of guide is suggested as a resource for the lesson?
choices: Local plant identification guides specific to Timor-Leste
questions.answer: Local plant identification guides specific to Timor-Leste

questions.question: What safety equipment is listed as necessary for the foraging activity?
What culinary activity is included in the unit?
choices: Prepare a meal using foraged ingredients
questions.answer: Prepare a meal using foraged ingredients

questions.question: What is the first step in the lesson plan's warm-up activity?
choices: Display various local plants and ask students to guess which are edible
questions.answer: Display various local plants and ask students to guess which are edible

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT listed as a key vocabulary term in the lesson plan?
What type of scenario practice is suggested in the lesson plan?
What is the main focus of the homework assignment?
choices: Writing a research paper on plant biology
Creating a personal field guide of 5 edible plants
Cooking a multi-course meal with foraged ingredients
questions.answer: Creating a personal field guide of 5 edible plants

questions.question: What is the definition of 'sustainable harvesting' provided in the lesson plan?
choices: Collecting as many plants as possible in one trip
Using modern tools to efficiently harvest plants
Collecting plants in a way that allows for regeneration and minimal environmental impact
questions.answer: Collecting plants in a way that allows for regeneration and minimal environmental impact

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as part of the homework field guide assignment?
What is emphasized regarding plant identification in the lesson?
choices: The importance of proper identification and dangers of misidentification
questions.answer: The importance of proper identification and dangers of misidentification

questions.question: What type of experts are mentioned to assist with the guided foraging walk?
Which of these is listed as a required resource for the lesson?
What aspect of traditional Timorese knowledge is incorporated into the lesson?
choices: Plant uses for food and medicine
questions.answer: Plant uses for food and medicine

questions.question: What is the recommended duration for the guided foraging walk and meal preparation activity?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a consideration when foraging?
What type of environment is NOT specifically mentioned for foraging in the lesson content?
What is the primary purpose of the wrap-up and review session?
choices: To assign grades for the foraging activity
To plan the next foraging expedition
To discuss and reflect on what was learned during the foraging walk
questions.answer: To discuss and reflect on what was learned during the foraging walk

questions.question: Which of these items is NOT listed as necessary for the cooking activity?
What safety item is mentioned as necessary for the foraging activity?
What skill is practiced during the hands-on portion of the practice activities?
What type of plants does the lesson focus on besides edible plants?
What is the suggested method for testing plant edibility in the wild?
choices: The lesson emphasizes not testing unknown plants and relying on proper identification
questions.answer: The lesson emphasizes not testing unknown plants and relying on proper identification

questions.question: What cultural aspect is integrated into the foraging lesson?
What is the recommended approach for harvesting plants according to the lesson?
choices: Focus on rare species for their unique properties
